comments.content: Yes.. I saw your image.. I think they probably update the logo as the years went on.. I think this font matches one of there seasons etc.. umm sorry I was'nt of more help..
There was another request, but it was for a S&H tshirt that was in Candice. I'm guessing it was either custom or undigitized, as hard as that is for me to believe.

I think this is Phil Martin's [Legothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023810/http:/www.roostertypes.com/prod_display.asp?group_id=LegothicURW), which is a non-stencil version of Advertisers Gothic.

This thread doesn’t match the [ARCHIVE THREAD](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023810/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48146.html?1094275723)???

I already have an Advertisers bold font, but not exactly as shown in the “STARSKY & HUTCH” banner image in the [ARCHIVE THREAD](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123023810/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48146.html?1094275723).

Where did Stephen Coles get his font??? Thanks!
